thread.title: Boise State vs. CSU football: Live game chat
thread.title_full: Boise State vs. CSU football: Live game chat

title: Boise State vs. CSU football: Live game chat
text:
Boise State vs. CSU football: Live game chat Live Blog Boise State vs. CSU football  ; Matt L. Stephens , matthewstephens@coloradoan.com 4:55 p.m. MDT October 10, 2015 CSU mascot CAM the Ram with fans in the third quarter against the Colorado Buffaloes at Sports Authority Field at Mile High. (Photo: Ron Chenoy/USA TODAY Sports) 10 CONNECT 10 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Colorado State football team needs something to get its season jump started. The Rams still have an excellent chance of making a bowl game, sitting at a 2-3 record with seven games to play, but coach Mike Bobo could use a signature win early in his tenure and none would be bigger than upsetting No. 25 Boise State. 
The Broncos (4-1) enter Saturday's 5 p.m. kickoff at Hughes Stadium winners of their last three with two victories orchestrated by freshman quarterback Brett Rypien. If CSU can pull the upset (Boise State is favored by 15 points), it would put the Rams back in contention for a Mountain West championship. 
Join Coloradoan sports columnist Matt L. Stephens and CSU reporter Kelly Lyell for a live chat Saturday beginning an hour before kickoff and lasting through the end of the game. Ask them your questions, get their analysis and join in the conversation. 
If you're a mobile app user, please follow this link . Read or Share this story: http://noconow.co/1Lo0SXR TOP VIDEOS
